jobDescription: At Mojio, were connecting the cars of today for the journeys of tomorrow. Backed by leading investors including Amazon and Deutsche Telekom, Mojio is driving the global adoption of its connected car technology via its growing portfolio of mobile network operator customers, including T-Mobile in the US, Austria and Czech Republic, Bell, Rogers and Telus in Canada, and Telekom Deutschland in Germany. With more than 7 billion miles worth of real-world driving data, we have created one of the largest and fastest-growing big data pools in the automotive industry. If youre interested in joining us on our mission to give every vehicle a voice, apply now! Who you are You have data-driven mindset and are passionate about deriving interesting facts from massive amount of data using analytical skills and tools to drive engineering decisions. You should be capable of building solutions that provide actionable inferences from field data sets & ability to communicate it to a wide audience. The role requires ability to collaborate with multiple teams and identifying new opportunities to take on emerging engineering challenges. Education Details Bachelors or Masters degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Operation Research, Software Engineering or equivalent from top accredited universities. Key Qualifications2-5 years of experience in a mixture of data analyst work and software engineeringExperience querying SQL and NoSQL databases such as SQL Server, MongoDb, ElasticSearch, and DocumentDbExperience working with one of the Cloud Service providers such as Microsoft Azure, AWS, or Google Cloud PlatformExperience in software development methodologies and working knowledge in Scala/Python and/or any other programming languages (C#, Java, R, C/C++)Experience with analytical tools supporting data evaluation and report creation, as well as querying large, complex data setsDemonstrated track record of creating and building complex evaluation tools for assessing/tracking product performance and learning associated user behaviors.Familiarity with Spark/Hadoop or similar frameworks.Flexibility and comfort working on a dynamic, fast-growing effort with minimal documentation and process.Aptitude to deal with ambiguity, and enthusiasm to help solve difficult issues All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, sex, color, religion, national origin, protected veteran status, gender identity, social orientation, nor on the basis of disability. Posted positions are not open to third party recruiters/agencies and unsolicited resume submissions will be considered free referrals.
